name: Hotel Vecellio

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 4 wonderful days in Matteo's great little hotel. Apart from the lovely decorated clean rooms and a very convenient location, it's the very personal touch with wich his owner leads his place, that makes it special. We definitely enjoyed our time there and we would recommended it without hesitation.
reviews.title: Fabulous 4 days in a great spot!

likes.disliked: — The breakfirst wasn't the most opulent, but the cappucino was the best!

reviews.text: This hotel is great value for what you get.. our room was decently sized, very clean, with quality classically styled furnishings, cable TV (CNN in English), air conditioning that worked and a nice (if rather small) bathroom. Our shower was fully enclosed (I gather some may not be from earlier reviews) and worked well. Nothing dusty or musty about the place at all - quite the opposite in fact.
reviews.title: Great little hotel

likes.liked: — A shop just out of the hotel to the right (50 yds) sells reasonably priced snacks and drinks (beer/wine too)

description: The REAL VENICE!Perfect Venetian style, the warm feeling of marble floors, antique wood ceilings and rich drapes, make Hotel Vecellio a welcoming place in a residential part of the city that looks towards the lagoon in front of the most famous islands including Murano. Nearby there's Titian Vecellio's home and painters studio that gives this neighbourhood a distinct romantic atmosphere. The Hotel is managed by Matteo, native venetian lives in the city , he could be useful to help you to live your venetian experience such as a real venetian.
